<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeSDFRaymarch"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeSDFRaymarch

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

SDF raymarching algorithm to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Casts a ray against the screen SDF (signed-distance field) and returns the distance travelled.
